rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports available vaccines factually without using high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports the number of licensed vaccines but lacks explicit calming language.
No bare negation or statement of absence/unlikelihood.
Reports existence of licensed vaccines ('there are close to 20 licensed vaccines') without active reassurance.
